content.detailedDescription:
Around mid july 2008 i randomly filmed around my bedroom. a 1 minute & 17 second video was taken & two tall cloudy entities were caught on my digital camera. split second paused frames reveal 2 white entities with black almond shaped bug eyes. they hovered for about 15 seconds, observed me, then de-materialised. they then ascended upwards & disappeared, leaving a shadow trail underneath them. a reptilian humanoid face was also caught. other events include a black figure observed brisk walking fast in broad daylight. my cat making an unusual winding meow. my tv being turned on by itself with no picture or sound.

attached below is part of the 1 minute & 17 second video footage. i have the full footage burnt onto a blank dvd-r. also attached is photos taken from split second paused images of the footage. they say that there is no photographic evidence of a grey alien? i believe that there were 2 grey alien entities caught in my bedroom back in mid july 2008
content.summary: Due to approximately 9 months of paranormal events, this footage was randomly caught in my bedroom. it was picked up via video on my digital camera. nothing was seen with the naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the mexican side of the us ( texas ) border town of ciudad acuna directly across from del rio , tx .  

we were driving north west along the highway to the lake amistad a little after 1 am .  

as we came over a ridge just a short distance before the lake entrance , on the road before us was a bright yellow solid large sphere , completely lit yellow , with no visible means of how it kept itself up.  it was as large as four sedans but perfectly round . silent . no jets or prop prppeelers . 

it just hovered some 30 feet above the road and should it have landed it would have taken the entire width of the road , and there would have been no way around it . 

to make matters stranger parked on the opposute side of it to us , on the road ahead of us , facing our direction , was a mexican military humvee . 

we passed under the ufo driving about 35mph and while i was worried about the ufo i didnt want to stop and be harrassed later by the mexican military .  

i drove right under the object and continued until i passed the military humvee , and out the top of the suv was a seated soldier and he was looking up at the object with his jaw open . 

we continued to the lake and waited a good time.  i didnt want to return too soon and cole acriss them again . 

i wish i had but i was terribly afraid of the object and the military pressence.  

i half expected as i drove by the mexican humvee to see a soldier holding some sort of remote control , somehow controlling the craft . no , on the contrary the soldier i could see looked dumbfounded . 

while i did not take a video or camera shot because i didnt want to be detained or lose my ohone , vehicle , freedom or life ... there was the mexican military humvee and its driver , co passanger and the soldier i saw also more than my wife and i . i know they saw it also . 

there was a ufo crash in this same area in the 50s known as the del rio ufo incident . 

whatever is flying out here , and i can tell you thus was not a drone , or a blimp , or a prop or jet proppeled plane , helicopter , untra-light , meteor , star , and i am not sure what caused its bright brilliant illumination , but there was no doors or windows or discernable features on the outside at all . it did not move as we drove towards it , under it , or away from it and passed the military vehicle , it just hovered above the road in the night sky .
content.summary: Bright large ufo in mexico . mexican military humvee on road also watching .

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting outside in the sunroom attached to the west side of my house, casually remenissing the strange occurance of a ufo sighting we shared togesther (july 7 2016 7:36 p.M.) the year before. i had been noticing a strange dark cloud in the s.W. sky that seemed to defy logic. the wind was blowing hard in a few different directions as it had appeared in the layers of clouds, but this one cloud that stood out to be different to me had not moved in an hour or more. the sun was begining to set in the s.W. and as it shined it back lit this clud i a srange way . there was a cresent of reflected light within the cloud that i had not seen before i had  onsidered this odd. i had started to video tape the cloudbecause we had noticed a strsnge white orb that was movng on the far right hand side of the cloud. we had noticed that the white orb was not the only thing up near this cloud , there was also an airplane that had been orbiting in a pattern on the far left side of the cloud. from my perspective it looked like the orb was hiding from the black orbiting plane. the orb moved from the top of the cloud did an s- like manover snd headed into a dark spot within the cloud and the orb disspeared . it was no longer visable and the eminating light from the orb was no longer visable. it sermed like a rare coinsidence that the experience we were having was all so familliar to the one we had a year before. in that case we had seen a pop can shaped cylinder in the sky we were baffled as to what it was, and as we were watching the actions of object it had vanished, within 5 seconds wete observed a cf-18 climb in the sky to very much the last seen proximity of the object where the fighter jet had then banked hard to the right and faded out of view.
content.summary: White orb looked like it was taking evasive action to hide from aiplane in (sun ) backlit cloud. orb then proceeded to take directional changes , then move twards black spot in cloud , then disappeared from site of naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I had my friend with me who also witnessed this event. we pulled over and observed for 2-3mins before the lights flew away. i’ve never seen a plane or helicopter like this. it hovered and it was way to big to be drone . headlights can’t move like that or blink like that. i have no explanation of. what it could be
content.summary: 3 huge white horizontal lights hovering in sky:l thought was headlights until height showed otherwise lighten hover e, blinkered thenbegan moving slowly then sped up and dissesroesnnn into sky

content.detailedDescription: This is not a ufo per-say, it was a very weird looking chemtrail that i wanted to share to see f u have any experience with this or could share this to see if anyone else saw this. it almost looked like it was a surface to air rocket trail. i was on 495 highway in montgomery county maryland, driving and right off the highway there was this chemtrail looking thinkg going from the ground almost straight up at an angle. as i drive around the beltway i saw a smaller line next to the larger one, the pictures will show this. very weird and i wonder what this was, any help would be appreciated. i know this isn't a ufo, but indeed very strange. thank you very much
content.summary: Chemtrail going from ground up to sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck when i noticed a glint in the sky over the rocky mountains a little to the south.  i thought at first it was an airplane, but as i watched it, i realized it was not.  i got my camera and telephoto lens and took some pictures.  the photos i took were over a 2-minute time period before i was interrupted by a phone call. it was descending very slowly. at first it looked to be descending in a slightly southward direction, but it changed its course slightly as it descended, and it was then coming almost straight down and then a bit to the north.

although my camera's date and time is set correctly, the time on these photos indicate they were taken from 4:50 to 4:52 a.M., which is impossible as you can see from the pictures--which is something else rather weird.  it was actually sometime between noon and 1:00, i believe, because i went outside when i let the dogs out while i took a break from work.  this may be something totally normal, but i sure don't recognize what it could be.

i didn't give it a lot of thought at first, but when i downloaded my pictures that evening, i noticed that it was something strange that i sure didn't recognize. i sent a couple of photos to the local tv station--channel 9 news asking if they had any other reports about this or if they knew what it was.  i received no response.  

like i said, this may be something perfectly normal--maybe a piece of the chinese space station broke off early? i would just like to know what it was. this is the last thing in the world i ever thought i would  do...

i got a phone call that i rushed a bit, but when i went back out it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Object with trailing vapor/smoke decending very slowly over the rocky mountains

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, oct 16, 2017, i was traveling to roswell new mexico by myself, coming from clovis nm going in a southwest direction.  i stopped in a little town of elda around 9:30 am to take some pictures of some old building and local monuments
i started out of town at around 9:45 am. i was driving and pointing snapping pictures out the from the windshield and also the passenger side window. as i was passing an old farmhouse to my left, i snapped a few shot of it. and kept going down the highway to roswell.I had taken many pictures on my little trip. after returning home wanted to view my shot to post on facebook for my friends to see.
tonight, friday, oct 20, 2017, i started looking at another batch of shot when i came across two shots that have two white objects flying about the old farmhouse.  i did notice in the sky while i was driving to roswell nm. one object in the picture is small egg-shaped like in appearance, the other object is much bigger in size and has a triangle shape to it. i heard no sound but my car window was up and i was traveling about 60 mph at the time.
content.summary: Two objects, one was egg shaped other was triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard in oakville, ontario at approximately 8:20 p.M. on october 20, 2017. i was out trying to spot meteorites from the orionids, so i was already looking skyward. a meteor had just transited the sky from west to east. suddenly in the southern sky, two triangle or diamond-shaped orange (very orange) lights transited toward the east, moving faster than an airplane, slower than a meteor. they appeared to be low in altitude, approximately 30 degrees above the horizon. initially i thought it might be an illuminated banner being towed, but it stopped suddenly and did a couple of direction changes very slowly, then disappeared from my view behind trees and neighboring houses. i held up my hands to measure the distance between the two lights. with my arms extended fully, and the tips of my thumbs touching, they appeared about as far apart as my extended little fingers. that measures about one foot apart at full arm’s length. the entire “flight” i observed was less than 30 seconds.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 triangle shaped orange lights flying in a coordinated manner, first quickly, then paused

content.detailedDescription:
Desde el lunes 16/10/17 estábamos acampados en puerto coig, un pueblo y puerto abandonado que queda a la orilla del mar entrando por la ruta provincial 57 a una distancia de alrededor de 125 kilómetros de río gallegos.
pensábamos quedarnos 10 días para observar las estrellas porque somos aficionados a la astronomía y de pasó pasar unas mini vacaciones con nuestros tres hijos que estudian en buenos aires en un lugar tranquilo y respetando el medio ambiente.
éramos 5 adultos y como a la medianoche de ayer 19/10/17 empezamos a escuchar un rumor apagado como un ronroneo lejano pero insistente, al principios no vimos nada raro pero el rumor siguió por casi 1 hora.
después de ese tiempo vimos una iluminación color azul eléctrico hacia el oeste como si alguien alumbra el cielo con un reflector que salía de un pequeño valle como a unos 500 metros, decidimos ir a ver de qué se trataba pensando que podía ser un sitio de extracción de petróleo.
fuimos los 5 pero antes de llegar al borde de la hondonada como a los 200 metros se elevó un helicóptero grande de color gris muy claro o blanco y sin luces, que quedó sobre la luz iluminado desde abajo.
entonces nos paramos donde estábamos y nos pusimos a mirar con los binoculares con los que observamos las estrellas, el helicóptero no tenía marcas y prácticamente no hacía ruido, el rumor o ronroneo venía de abajo de la hondonada.
en un instante apareció a lo lejos como a unos 80 metros de nosotros una figura saliendo de la hondonada y viniendo para nosotros,era alta y pensamos que era una persona primero, pero mirando con mas detalle con los binoculares vimos que parecía no tener manos ni pies y que estaba como flotando sobre el piso.
tenía la cabeza separada del cuerpo por un cuello fino y largo y en este tenía como un objeto a modo de collar oscuro con una luz que giraba a su alrededor.
sacamos varias fotos con el adaptador del celular (de 40 megapixel) para los binoculares mientras esto pasaba.
nos asustamos mucho y mas cuando esa criatura levantó uno de sus brazos que parecían terminar en muñones sin manos hacia donde estábamos nosotros.
entonces comenzamos a correr como locos para donde teníamos el camping sin mirar atrás, cuando llegamos levantamos todo como pudimos y lo tiramos adentro de la camioneta y salimos a toda velocidad para nuestra casa.
no sabemos qué era todo eso pero unos amigos nos recomendaron a alguien en río gallegos que estudia estos temas, les vamos a llevar las fotos en persona después de las elecciones del domingo 22.
content.summary: Una noche de terror en puerto coig

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were standing outside his cabin at twilight and i noticed the first star of the night and immediately i noticed these 2 very large, very bright lights moving at about 50 degrees magnetic. the second was trailing the lead light at about 45  degrees to its right. we had an unobstructed view of the objects as they sped across the sky and suddenly vanished. there was no wind, no sound. the lights were bigger and brighter than the lights of any aircraft i have ever seen and they moved quickly then vanished. my friend had the same view as i and gave the same description. there was still a lot of illumination at the time we saw the lights.
content.summary: At twilight, saw 1st star in cloudless sky then saw these 2 lights moving fast in echelon

content.detailedDescription:
At least five sets of diamond and lozenge shaped lights were observed traveling southward. lights merged and split several times, changing shape and size. they passed at low altitude over a four-lane highway, and had to have been seen by several dozen cars.

the next day, helicopters flew low and continuously over that approximate area.
content.summary: Massive amount of lights traveling over a highway

content.detailedDescription:
I can't be specific about dates and times. the event happened in the early 1990s while i was working as a security guard alone in a very large auto parts warehouse late at night. (the site has since been removed and replaced, and is now a location of condos and townhouses. the original building is gone.)

it was my habit of taking a nap during my shift after having made my rounds. at the time, i was also being treated for a (still undiagnosed) heart condition.

what i recount next is how i told the story to friends for years, since its from the point of view of which i experienced it. i have since come to believe that something slightly different happened - namely that i may have been abducted. (or 'retrieved', as i prefer to put it.)

anyway, i was asleep, when suddenly i felt an abrupt thump in my chest. i thought that my heart had stopped, and i had died.

my immediate reaction was to attempt to leave my body, and i almost did. my spirit exited my dead (?) body, and i was slowly rising up away from it, into and thru the wooden ceiling above me.

during the transition, i somehow got stranded in the matter of the wooden ceiling, and got stuck.

suddenly, three entities appeared to me, took me by the hand, and gently guided me back into my body, which had already grown cold. it felt very heavy, and very cumbersome to be pushed back inside it.

the entities were very gentle with me, and seemed to be proud of me. our communication was not verbal, or even mental, per se, but was more emotional. (i am extremely empathic and psychic.)

after making sure i was back inside my own body, they departed, but there was no ship to speak of, just a gentle light.

one other thing: the perception that lingered after their departure was that they were actually me as a man, a boy, and a child with cold hands.(the entity who guided me back into my body had cold hands.)

several years after the event, i changed my mind of what may have occurred. i now think that instead of dying, i was accidentally awakened during the aftermath of an abduction event. (or i woke up by force, i have often awakened during surgical procedures and fought with doctors who had already anesthetized me.)

previous to that occurrence, i had had (and continue to have) similar types of events, basically all my life.
content.summary: Physical encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out by the fire when a strange feeling came over me. i got my phone and started snapping pics as the craft was hovering over me. it made my fire go crazy, it looked like something ejected from the craft, then bbegin to take form through the fire somehow. two days later there was a beautiful rock of all colors , glass like fragments all fused together somehow , in my driveway. i guess it was a gift. they are not scary, inviting actually.
content.summary: It was blue with lights around it, seemed to be pulling energy from the fire

content.detailedDescription: On october 18th, 2017 at 7:25 in the morning my friend and i were travelling by taxi and coming off the hepburnville exit off of rt. 15 when i looked up in the sky and saw a bright red light in the morning sky. at first i thought it was maybe mars, a plane or satellite but then it slowly pulsed brighter and disappeared. i then brought it to the attention of my buddy and he saw it when it reappeared. it did the same thing again twice more but then completely disappeared. i would normally think it was an airplane but the speed of the pulsation was far slower than any airplane i've seen before.  also, it was stationary and the light coming from it was more like a lighthouse speed than a commuter beacon from the local airport. it was more like a gradual dimming. i thought it wise to report even though it's still likely an aircraft possibly reflecting reddish dawn light.
content.summary: My friend and i were saw a red light in the sky pulse and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: On october 18th, 2017 at 7:25 in the morning my friend and i were travelling by taxi and coming off the hepburnville exit off of rt. 15 when i looked up in the sky and saw a bright red light in the morning sky. at first i thought it was maybe mars, a plane or satellite but then it slowly pulsed brighter and disappeared. i then brought it to the attention of my buddy and he saw it when it reappeared. it did the same thing again twice more but then completely disappeared. i would normally think it was an airplane but the speed of the pulsation was far slower than any airplane i've seen before.  also, it was stationary and the light coming from it was more like a lighthouse speed than a commuter beacon from the local airport. it was more like a gradual dimming. i thought it wise to report even though it's still likely an aircraft possibly reflecting reddish dawn light.
content.summary: My friend and i were saw a red light in the sky pulse and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Venía bajando hacia el sur, hacia la ciudad de río gallegos en la provincia de santa cruz, había salido antes de la medianoche y estaba llegando a la zona del paraje coy aike, que no es una ciudad sino que su nombre se lo da una estancia cercana que ha tomado el nombre de la tradición tehuelche indígena del lugar.
este paraje está a unos 80 km antes de llegar a río gallegos sobre la ruta nacional 3, era de madrugada, estaba oscuro y había poco y nada de tránsito en la ruta, yo viajaba en una suv 4x4, bien dormido y atento al camino por el que circulaba a unos 100 km/h.
en un momento después de la bajada del río coig o coyle veo a lo lejos unas luces sobre la ruta, muy tenues pero lejanas, y a medida que me acercaba se veían al ras de piso, pasé el puente y comencé a tomar la subida cuando de repente veo en el medio de la ruta a menos de 150 metros dos figuras como difusas que no estaban tocando el piso.
lo primero que se me ocurrió es que se trataba de animales sueltos por lo que instintivamente aceleré el vehículo a mas de 180 km/h, cualquiera sabe que es la única forma en la que uno puede salir ileso del choque con ganado.
me aferré al volante y llegue al instante, cuando estaba por golpearlas las luces del vehículo mostraron dos seres o algo así de cuello largo y brazos que parecían desaparecer entes de llegar a las manos, un torso largo y piernas que también parecían desaparecer antes de llegar al piso.
tenían un rostro nada parecido al humano y en la parte baja del cuello una especie de collar como negro muy oscuro.
pensé en frenar pero venía muy rápido y sabia que si lo hacía iba a volcar, por lo que solo esperé el impacto, pero el vehículo atravesó a las 2 entidades como si no estuvieran ahí; esto pasó antes de terminar la subida justa en el lugar donde hay unas lomadas, después la ruta da vuelta a la derecha, miré por el espejo y las figuras, fantasmas o entidades seguían ahí en el mismo lugar al medio de la ruta.
seguí algunos metros y paré en la banquina, esperé un par de minutos y me bajé del vehículo llevando el spray de pimienta en la mano, la suv no tenía ni un rasguño, caminé hacia atrás pasando la curva y ya no había nada.
volví al vehículo y me quedé ahí unos minutos, me tomé unos mates para tranquilizarme y luego seguí camino.
hice unos 10 km hacia el sur y cuando estaba transitando la subida a la que llaman "subida larga", un helicóptero blanco atravesó la ruta de este a oeste muy bajo por sobre el camino, sentí solo un rumor y me pareció raro porque estaba muy cerca, eso me asustó un poco así que apresuré la marcha para llegar a río gallegos.
en el puesto de guer aike, 30 km antes de llegar a río gallegos me preguntaron de donde venía y si había visto algo raro en la ruta, les dije que solo un helicóptero, nadie me iba a creer lo de las entidades que vi y mucho menos que las atravesé con la suv.
content.summary: Fantasma, extraterrestre o qué?

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10pm, me and my boyfriend where driving on the blue ridge parkway where we live close to, and i look over and see a bright orange orb coming up about the treetop, we got out of the car and watched them for two hours. doing weird maneuvers, and vanishing instantly. we've been watching them for about 3-4 months now. they show up about every other night. when i first seen the orbs, i thought it could've been a chinese lantern,but it was way to bright at such a distance to be, i also thought it could've been a military object, but after observing them more there is absolutely no way. they move so quick, then instantly come to a stop and just hover. they will come up, move around a bit, then go out like a light. i sat and watched 13 come up one after the other. there's no doubt in my mind it is a ufo. it is guaranteed you will see them if you come. i've never seen anything like it, and it absolutely amazes me. we show people them all the time, and they have no idea what it possibly could be. they amaze everyone who sees them. i can never capture them on camera good cause of my phone, so i can't submit any video sadly, but it's a have to see thing. so please, contact me! thank you. -sabrina
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange orbs, they hover then instantly move left to right and stop automatically. never have a seen anything like this, you can see them every night! it is insane..

content.detailedDescription:
At 845pm, i noticed 3 objects falling from high in sky. literally 'right there'.  i pulled over to observe them.  the 3 lights were lighting up randomly, in triangle, orion's belt shapes, lighting up, bam, 1,2,3.   then go out.  triangle would even spin, orions belt would show up, vertically,  then disappear, then show up in horizontal configuration.  then i noticed an 'orb' appear to come up from the ground, or from far on the horizon, it traveled and joined the other 3 orbs pretty quickly.  then a few minutes later, a 2nd one came from where the other one did, it joined the other 4, now there are 5 in the sky.  it looked like, if you ever looked at jupiter through a telescope, one brighter one representing a planet, and the others were dimmer and orbiting it like moons.  they made random formations, and lights came on squentially for at least 25 minutes.  i phoned my mother, and narrated to her what i was seeing.  begging her to get in her car and look.  as i was on the phone with her, a 'plane' came from directly south, and flew, directly over my position,  the plane had 2 stacked 'rings' of lights on it.  only about 500'to 1000' high,  it flew directly over me, and flew directly at the 'main' light.  by this time, the 'orbs' had spread out in the sky, along the horizion, maybe a couple miles apart, and maybe only a few miles from me.   the plane flew to each "orb" individually.  now i can see the 5 orbs, and the one plane clearly.  after the orbs spread out miles apart, they came back together in a small group, and spread out again, several times. what i saw in the sky was better than every video ive ever watched, that shows similar lights.  this was the night/day of the 8.5 inches of rain, wind was pretty stiff, the objects were not affected by the wind at all. about 820, the rain had broke, and another storm was on its way,  the objects were between the 2 heavy rain pockets. as i drove from south of sheridan, il to north of plano,il, i could see the 5 orbs and the plane the whole time, it never appeared that i got any closer to the 'orbs' though, even after driving 20 miles closer.  i fianlly lost sight of the orbs and plane, north of plano, where the rain got to heavy, and they just went out of sight. i checked my original position on google earth, and it looks like when the orbs were spread out, one was over, millington, millbrook, plano, sandwich, and sheridan. it took the plane a little bit to travel to each 'orb'.    945pm,  my mother calls me, she has my niece and nephew in the car by wspy tower.  they see the lights in the sky, making triangle formations, and different colors.  they all saw it too!!!!!.  it was real.  if i wasnt on the phone, i would have had the most amazing footage ever taken.  it was real,  i am amazed by what i saw.  now i believe that the most other videos on the net, are authentic.   the lights on the video show up as white, but they are not really white to the eye.  it was about 10pm or a little after, when i lost sight of the objects.  


the attached video is towards the beginning of the sighting.   it needs some enhancement with the lighting, there is more than meets the eye on the video,  the video is before the plane comes along.   i didnt film more because i thought it wasnt going to show up on the video, so i made the call to my mom, desperate for another witness. i would be very interested to see the video enhanced if you guys can do it.   one photo is where i first saw the thing, daylight photo.     the google earth image is where i was parked, with the area of action in red.   thank you

chris
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 5 orbs, lighting up in formations

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from my local shop, i looked up and saw this bright white light, almost full moon like in how white and illuminating it was. it appeared ball like but had slight slight light coming off of it in the shape of a star. i thought at first it was a drone of helicopter but it was not moving.It don't hover or slightly change direction it was perfectly still, shining ever so brightly but slightly pulsing, dimming a little for a few milliseconds before it became bright again. i stared at it for about a minute and a half, outside my house before i ran inside and to my window that faced the exact same way i stood, in about 10-15 seconds but it was gone, completely gone, i couldn't see it flying off somewhere else or it slowly fade away, it was as if it was never there to begin with or it became invisible.
content.summary: Strange bright ball of light un-moving that suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Obelisques dans un double cratere (rocher en bas a gauche cratere de gauche),mer sombre joue droite de la lune,ce cratere avait une poussiere "neuve" autour comme un nouvel impact meteoritique ,au lieu d etre simple a fond conique ,il s en revela 2 a l interieur plat reverberant la lumiere.
au centre des 2 crateres j y voyait 2 grandes aiguilles avec leurs ombres,2 jumelles.30 ans apres sur google ,apres avoir passã© 2 jour a chercher , j ai trouvã© un calque fait au stylo representant exactement ce que j avait vu en + zommã© ,c etait bien 2 obelisques, leurs bases etait chamfreinã©es,comme une pyramide tronquã©e a son sommet et puis inversã©e servant de base;des obelisques formã©s de 3 pyramides.
farouk el baz geologue egyptien et americain travaillant a la nasa a donnã© la possiblitã© a faire atterrir 17 missions.

la photo, je l ai effacã© par mecontentement,aigritude et non confiance en moi,mais je n ai pas cette image,ce qui me rend frustrã© ,mais au moins je continue.
j ai demandã© a des astro physiciens sur une page facebook ,qui visiblement sont confirmã©s,un d entre eux a entendu parlã© du mythe et m a precisã© que ses tours faisaient au moins 1km d altitude.
j espere retrouvã© ce document ,merci.
content.summary: Monuments

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home across a dark park with not a cloud in the sky! in front of me at aprox 47degrees above the horizon i saw an orange obect fly across the sky it seemed to bounce off the stratosphere and then speed up it was not a meteorite there was no tail it then sped up and shot across the sky at speed then vanished it happened very quickly.I came home and told my partner then my mum.This morning i googled the description and the net is slight with similar sightings! i know what i saw! it's the second time in my life i've seen foreign objects in the sky!
content.summary: Orange sphere descended slowed down then ascended at steady speed then simply vanished

content.detailedDescription: We were in the back yard to observe uranus using binoculars. in the north east sky, which was clear, we noticed a shimmering light. we looked through the binoculars and saw a white, bright light with red and green orbs dancing around it. to the left of the object was what i can only describe as a "jelly fish" like mass that had multicolored lights inside. we observed it for over an hour. we did see airplanes flying below object, but object was stationary.
content.summary: Multi colored object, stationary

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were at the roof of a 5storeyed complex(flat).It's diwali in here(india) so we were taking pictures of our well lit town.Suddenly i spotted a bright white dot in the sky,and instantanenously i became pretty sure that it wasn't any sort of fireworks because it was moving in an intelligent trajectory with change of direction & it was pretty up high,the sky wasn't much crowded by clouds but there were some,the stars were visible by the naked eye but wasn't bright enough to be caught on tape,but the object was well recorded in my phone's video which only shows the intensity/magnetude of its brightness.I am sure it wasn't any plane or helicopter because there wasn't any sound & i have been seeing planes & helicopters fly for a long time to correctly understand the difference.It came from north west flew(hovered) towards east.We lost visual when it went behind the clouds.I am attaching the video and screenshots of the object i have made from the video.I used focus magic to correct the motion blur and a bit more visual detail about the object was revealed.
content.summary: Bright white star like with unexplained trajectory

content.detailedDescription: observed this 2 nights in a row, first night, sighted and viewed throw 16 power rifle scope and binoculars. observed for over 2 hours shapes range from 5 point star to triangle half cresent round and straight line. stationary then rapid dancing. flashing beams or white light.At times had red beams off lower portion of formation. object moved to southern skies. this morning the smae object appeared the same as lst night still watching it now. similar observations as last night. similar patterns same colored lights. shows up around 2 am.  appears low in the sky.
content.summary: Bright lights changing shapes brighter thean any stars 5 orbs or more constantly changing shapes

content.detailedDescription: Walked out of my apartment complex about to get into my car for practice. looked up to admire the stars during this clear night. while looking up i saw a seemingly solid black, triangle, object go across the sky. it appeared to be fairly large with a wing span similar to a large plane. about 5 small and dim lights ran down each of the sides making an upside-down "v". the apex of it had one extra light ahead of it. all the lights moved in perfect unison making me believe it to be a one solid object. the lights on it were no brighter than the stars around it so it was difficult to see, but it did appear to block the light of the stars as it passed over head. it seemed to be around 100-150 ft off the ground and made no noise as it flew over.
content.summary: Ufo fly over on a clear night sky

content.detailedDescription: Oct 19 about 11pm was in backyard looking for uranus to view with telescope. looked to west at bright star was about to look at when object flew right into my line of sight. i have researched this subject so i recognized it immediately. object was a flying triangle with multiple round thing on the bottom. this is the 1st time ive ever had anything like this happen,and i felt like i couldnt have been the only person to see it. selfridge ang base is 10 miles away and i frequently see aircraft from there flying over,but ive never seen any craft like this one.
content.summary: Was in backyard looking for uranus with telescope black triangle shaped with circles on bottom flew west to east right over my head i was astonished

content.detailedDescription: Was driving in darkness down hwy 292 from inman towards hwy 29.  open field bordered by tall pines (80-90ft tall?) ahead and towards my right.  observed extremely bright white strobe appearing to move between the trees ahead.  one pulse/strobe=one movement to the right, about 100 ft a pulse/strobe.  moved equal distance for 5-6 strobes,then poof was gone. but almost in a blink, it was behind me perhaps half a mile back and moving on.  it appeared to make an instantaneous direction (90 degrees) and location change.  i saw it behind me from the bright glow of the strobe and because i was watching it.  it was weird.... so low to the ground.  no airports there; have no idea at all what it was.   amazing intense light!  i lost sight of it because i continued driving, and it was moving too fast to remain in my sight.  i felt amazed and baffled.
content.summary: Very bright strobe light moving below tree line;changed direction and location at an unimaginable speed.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were riding around the neighborhood on our skateboards, we then made a turn onto our street. i was in front of my friend, and i was focused on the ground. my friend-behind me- shouted at me to look in the sky, so i did. i looked into the sky and i saw 4 lights in a perfect diamond shape. these lights looked orange but kind of had a red tint to it. we saw these lights in between 2 trees, though the lights weren't actually "between the 2 trees" it looked like it was pretty close behind the trees. after about 30 seconds the lights slowly disappeared and we didn't see them any time after. my friend and i were very much in shock at the time of the event, and we didn't even think about pulling out our phones to record it.
content.summary: Red-orange lights in diamond shape; slowly faded away after ~30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a police officer on duty, about 0300 hours, sunday morning, seal beach, southern california. less than a mile off the beach, parked in the north american aviation parking lot observing the stars. earlier it had rained and washed the smog away revealing an incredible sky seldom seen in southern california in the 1960-1970s. it was probably april or may 1973.
  i observed to the northwest at an unknown but very high altitude what initially appeared to be a shooting star rapidly approaching my location. at that time it appeared to be bright white. it rapidly slowed, then came to a stop, probably above 75,000 feet. this only took a few seconds. next, it began to descend at a moderate rate of speed, straight down, coming to a hover less than 500 feet from me. color was dark gray, then began to pulse the same three colors in the same order. it was only a few feet above the munition bunkers at the seal beach naval weapon station. it remained stationary for perhaps ten minutes while i observed it through my 10x50 binoculars--it was so close and so large that i had to turn right and left to take in the rather large space vehicle. i noticed the navy security vehicles keeping a respectable distance from the vehicle. i later determined that the main gate had been closed while the incident was in progress. 
   the vehicle did not project light, it merely changed colors. after about 10 minutes it appeared to set up a search pattern over the munition bunkers, very slowly traveling over each row. then it gradually increased speed and appeared to follow power lines toward the ocean.
   i asked dispatch to check with huntington beach and see if its helicopter could assist. i did not reveal over the radio what circumstances lead to this request.  4210 henry (helicopter) was down for the night.  i attempted to follow the space vehicle but lost it as it entered huntington beach city limits.
   i logged the incident and turned the log in at end of shift. the watch commander called me in and i gave him a brief explanation. he did not want me to do an incident report, which would have triggered an entry in the department daily log that was read by journalists on a daily basis.
  weeks earlier 2 lapd officers on graveyard shift observed a space vehicle up close and personal.  they alerted the media which brought in air force investigators which rapidly led to the usual inane nonsense whenever turning back a ufo sighting. so i elected to avoid the nonsense.
   weeks later the orange county register put out an afternoon edition that had a large photo of "my" space ship. no article but several lines of print under the photo revealing that a company photographer took the picture of the space ship hovering over power lines just off an orange county freeway--i believe it was the newport beach freeway. traffic had come to a stop, meaning that at least hundreds witnessed, up close, this hovering space vehicle and thousands more observed the photo, page one above the fold.
  many years later, after medically retiring and becoming a journalist a researcher was sent to orange county and spent days going through the o.C. register files.  the space ship photo was not located.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Space vehicle observed entering earth's atmosphere, descend and hover a few feet off the ground near where i was standing, beside my police unit

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work like i always do and i sit in the same spot every day and gaze at the sky.One day when i was going to work it was a clear morning with some scattered clouds when i saw this sphere shaped object.It seemed to be about 1000 feet away and about 3000 feet high.It was close enough that i saw the cloud's reflecting off of it.About 4 minits later i was going to tell others on the bus to look and before i could i saw the thing fly away.I haven't seen anything on earth move that fast from a stand still in my life.
content.summary: I saw a sphere in the air while i was on the bus it was big then it was gone like 1000 miles an hour.
